___i18nFormat.x-prompt: Which translation file format would you like to use?
___i18nFormat.description: The translation file format, 'xlf' for XLIFF 1.2, 'xlf2' for XLIFF 2 or 'xmb' for XMB/XTB.

___useComandlineForLanguages.description: If set, all languages are given as command line argument to xliffmerge, otherwise they are configured in 'xliffmerge.json'

___languages.x-prompt: Which languages would you like to configure? (comma separated list like en,de,fr)
___languages.description: Target languages that you want to support (comma separated list like 'en,de,fr').

___useXliffmergeBuilder.description: When true, configure everything to use the architect builder for xliffmerge, otherwise the old style command line tool will be used.

___skipInstall.description: When true, does not install dependency packages.

___i18nLocale.x-prompt: Which default language do you use in your templates?
___i18nLocale.description: The default language used in your ng template files (local name like 'en' or 'de'). If not given, first language in list of languages is assumed, if even that is not given, 'en' is assumed

___localePath.description: The (optional) path where to create the translation files (relativ to src), default 'i18n'.

___path.description: The (optional) path to create the xliffmerge configuration.
